title: Handle Denied Boarding Due to Overbooking
description: A flight is overbooked, and a passenger is involuntarily denied boarding. The agent must handle the situation.

tasks.description: Apologize to the passenger and explain the situation.
Explain the passenger's rights and the compensation they are entitled to under regulations.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately explains the compensation rules for denied boarding.

tasks.description: Rebook the passenger on the next available flight and process their compensation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully rebooks the passenger and issues the required compensation (e.g., check or travel voucher).
